original_title: 世界の終わりという名の雑貨店
overview: Yutaka, tired of his writing job, is asked by his landlord to save his rundown apartment building from demolition by converting it into a variety store called "The End of the World".  Through this, he meets Huma, a high school student detached from her friends and parents, who finds it is the only place she can find any calm.
title: Somewhere on Earth
